name: AroundTheGround
description:
Description

AroundTheGround is a first person farming simulator.

You will play the role of a farmer who will take care of his garden. The application aims at learning the cultivation phases, teaching the use of agricultural tools and managing the sale.  The user will acquire this knowledge gradually, starting with simple actions and then moving on more complex actions.

You will need to take great care of plants, because during their growth they require an adequate amounts of water and protection from birds or worms. Once ready, the product can be collected and sold, in fact advanced skills are required to derive revenue from the sale. The farmer will have to manage finances with caution, buy tools or plant seeds to continue his business.
